page.title: 10Tea time
page.content: At teatime I usually have peanut butter sandwiches, crisps and an apple at 5. o clock. My mum is there and my dad is sometimes there. We sometimes eat it in the kitchen or in the frontroom on our laps. When tea is over my dad washes and I wipe up the dishes and plates and Daniel my brother packs away. Sometimes I play outside with my friends. We play tennis or ride our bikes. We sometimes watch TV. I don't have any supper before I go to bed. My best programmes on TV are Eastenders and Coronation Street. Then I start getting ready for bed at 8 o' clock.
